TextView.value: /yalm - Toggles yalm (if you cancel the ncu, will need to type twice).
Assign position to your characters, clear mobs on the floor, disable AttackBuddy and Sync(move) then press 'path to portal mob'.
When all in position, enable Attackbuddy. After the kill, press 'path' again to return to starting position and resume Sync.
(POH) Hightlight Rifts: Red is 10 or less, yellow is 10-20 and green is 20 + (seconds left)
